statements: SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM ProjectTimeline;
SELECT * FROM ProjectTimeline WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM ProjectTimeline WHERE milestone = 'Project Kickoff';
SELECT project_name, milestone FROM ProjectTimeline ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT project_id, project_name FROM ProjectTimeline WHERE end_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM ProjectTimeline ORDER BY start_date DESC, project_name ASC;
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date, end_date FROM ProjectTimeline WHERE milestone = 'Completed' ORDER BY end_date ASC;
SELECT project_id, project_name, DATE_FORMAT(start_date, '%M %d, %Y') AS start_date_formatted FROM ProjectTimeline WHERE project_id > 100 ORDER BY project_name DESC;
SELECT project_id, project_name, DATEDIFF(end_date, start_date) AS duration_days FROM ProjectTimeline WHERE milestone IS NOT NULL ORDER BY duration_days DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT project_name, COUNT(*) AS total_projects FROM ProjectTimeline GROUP BY project_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY total_projects DESC;
SELECT * FROM Project;
SELECT project_id, project_name FROM Project WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM Project ORDER BY start_date DESC, end_date ASC;
SELECT milestone_name, milestone_date FROM Milestones WHERE project_id = 2 ORDER BY milestone_date ASC;
SELECT project_id, COUNT(milestone_id) AS num_milestones FROM Milestones GROUP BY project_id HAVING num_milestones > 2;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM Project WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT milestone_name, milestone_date FROM Milestones WHERE project_id = 1 ORDER BY milestone_date DESC;
SELECT project_id, project_name, COUNT(milestone_id) AS num_milestones FROM Project JOIN Milestones ON Project.project_id = Milestones.project_id GROUP BY project_id, project_name;
SELECT project_name, milestone_name, milestone_date FROM Project INNER JOIN Milestones ON Project.project_id = Milestones.project_id WHERE milestone_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';

SELECT project_id, project_name, COUNT(milestone_id) AS num_milestones FROM Project LEFT JOIN Milestones ON Project.project_id = Milestones.project_id GROUP BY project_id, project_name ORDER BY num_milestones DESC;
SELECT * FROM Projects;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM Projects WHERE project_status = 'Active';
SELECT project_id, project_name FROM Projects ORDER BY project_id DESC;
SELECT milestone_name, due_date, completed_date FROM Milestones WHERE milestone_status = 'Completed';
SELECT team_member, role FROM ProjectTeam WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM Projects;
SELECT milestone_name, due_date, completed_date FROM Milestones WHERE milestone_status = 'In Progress';
SELECT team_member, role FROM ProjectTeam WHERE start_date >= '2021-01-01' AND end_date <= '2021-12-31';
SELECT project_name, team_member, role FROM Projects JOIN ProjectTeam ON Projects.project_id = ProjectTeam.project_id;
SELECT project_name, milestone_name, due_date FROM Projects JOIN Milestones ON Projects.project_id = Milestones.project_id ORDER BY due_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Project;
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date, end_date FROM Project WHERE project_id = '12345';
SELECT technician_id, technician_name FROM Technician ORDER BY technician_name ASC;
SELECT milestone_name, milestone_date FROM Milestone WHERE project_id = '54321' ORDER BY milestone_date DESC;
SELECT task_id, task_name, task_description FROM Task WHERE milestone_id = '98765';
SELECT * FROM Project;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM Project WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT t.task_name, t.task_description, m.milestone_name FROM Task t JOIN Milestone m ON t.milestone_id = m.milestone_id;

SELECT p.project_name, m.milestone_name, t.task_name, t.task_description FROM Project p JOIN Milestone m ON p.project_id = m.project_id JOIN Task t ON m.milestone_id = t.milestone_id WHERE p.start_date < '2023-01-01';

SELECT tech.technician_name, t.task_name, m.milestone_name, p.project_name FROM Technician tech JOIN Task t ON tech.technician_id = t.task_id JOIN Milestone m ON t.milestone_id = m.milestone_id JOIN Project p ON m.project_id = p.project_id ORDER BY tech.technician_name ASC, p.start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Project;
SELECT project_name, start_date FROM Project;
SELECT task_name, assignee, status FROM Tasks;
SELECT milestone_name, completion_date FROM Milestones;
SELECT project_id, milestone_name, completion_date FROM Milestones;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM Project
SELECT milestone_name, completion_date FROM Milestones ORDER BY completion_date DESC
SELECT task_name, assignee, status FROM Tasks WHERE status = 'In Progress'
SELECT project_name, team_member_id FROM ProjectTeam INNER JOIN Project ON Project.id = ProjectTeam.project_id
SELECT member_name, role FROM TeamMembers WHERE role = 'Developer'
